issue.title: [CF 1304] Timer Text being shown even when not checked
issue.body:
The recharge timer text on a spell cooldown with charges is being shown even when the option to show timer text is not checked.
- Using the Blizzard UI (not using any Omni CC, action bar replacements, other cooldown text addons, etc)
- Using TellMeWhen v8.1.3 r16 g36a2e96

Sample Icon exhibiting this behavior (Survival Hunter's Mongoose Bite):

``` ^1^T^SShowTimer^B ^SType^Scooldown ^SManaCheck^B ^SName^SMongoose~`Bite ^SClockGCD^B ^SSettingsPerView^T ^Sicon^T ^STexts^T ^N1^S ^N2^S ^t^t^t^SStates^T ^N4^T ^SAlpha^N0 ^t^t^SEnabled^B ^t^N81314^S~`~| ^Sicon^^ ```

> Posted by CurseForge user canofbutter | Imported from CurseForge issue #1304 | Raw
